projectGridLines.description:
AI for Education Innovation lab


CERI has set up an AI for Education Innovation lab with a view towards enabling the

Center to leverage the latest technological developments in the area of Artificial Intelligence to enhance the practice of teaching and learning

 

The objectives of the lab are as follows:


Develop AI based models to support teaching and learning

Leverage AIML techniques to develop evidence based methodologies in teaching, learning, and assessment

Identify other innovative applications of AI to enhance teaching and learning


The lab is expected to focus on the following initiatives:


AI enabled Learning Management System and Adaptive learning platforms

AI powered Chat bots for guiding/ mentoring students

AI enabled virtual teaching assistant

Application of Generative AI to such areas as personalized instruction, virtual tutoring,

evaluation, and automation

Leverage gamification to improve student engagement

CERI AI for Education Innovation lab is partnering with Spanda.AI to implement state of the art solutions in the above

areas to improve the practice of teaching and learning.


About Spanda.AI:


Spanda.ai is a US based stealth startup that offers a platform for Federated Generative AI with blockchain for high

value use cases in multiple sectors. We have collaborations with the IITs and BITS, Pilani as well as engagements with

Amazon in the US and with other companies in India
